text.64: evaṃ sīlaṃ caittāṇaṃ | dussīle ramaī mie
text.65: suṇiyā bhāvaṃ sāṇassa | sūyarassa narassa ya /
text.66: viṇae ṭhavejja appāṇam | icchanto hiyam appaṇo
text.71: aṇusāsio na kuppijjā | khaṃtiṃ sevijja paṇḍie /
text.72: khuḍḍehiṃ saha saṃsaggiṃ | hāsaṃ kīḍaṃ ca vajjae
text.73: mā ya caṇḍāliyaṃ kāsī | bahuyaṃ mā ya ālave /
text.74: kāleṇa ya ahijjittā | tao jhāijja egago
text.75: āhacca caṇḍāliyaṃ kau | na niṇhavijja kayāi vi /
text.76: kaḍaṃ kaḍe tti bhāsejjā | akaḍaṃ no kaḍe tti ya
text.77: mā galiyasse va kasaṃ | vayaṇam icche puṇo puṇo /
text.78: kasaṃ va daṭhum āiṇṇe | pāvagaṃ parivajjae
text.79: aṇāsavā thūlavayā kusīlā | miuṃ pi caṇḍaṃ pakarinti sīsā /
text.80: cittāṇuyā lahu dakkhovaveyā | pasāyae te hu durāsayaṃ pi
text.81: nāpuṭho vāgare kiṃci | puṭho vā nāliyaṃ vae /
text.83: appā ceva dameyavvo | appā hu khalu duddamo /
text.84: appā danto suhī hoi | assiṃ loe parattha ya
text.85: vari me appā danto | saṃjameṇa taveṇa ya /
text.86: māhaṃ parehi dammanto | bandhaṇehi vahehi ya
text.87: paḍaṇīyaṃ ca buddhāṇaṃ | vāyā aduva kammuṇā /
text.88: āvī vā jai vā rahasse | neva kujjā kayāi vi
text.89: na pakkhao na purao | neva kiccāṇa piṭhao /
text.90: na juṃje ūruṇā ūruṃ | sayaṇe no paḍissuṇe
text.91: neva palhatthiyaṃ kujjā | pakkhapiṇḍaṃ ca saṃjae /
text.92: pāe pasārie vāvi | na ciṭhe guruṇantie
text.93: āyāriehiṃ vāhitto | tusiṇīo na kayāi vi /
text.95: ālavante lavante vā | na nisīejja kayāi vi /
text.96: caiūṇam āsaṇaṃ dhīro | jao jattaṃ paḍissuṇe
text.97: āsaṇagao na pucchejjā | neva sejjāgao kayā /
text.99: evaṃ viṇayajuttassa | suttaṃ atthaṃ ca tadubhayaṃ /
text.101: musaṃ parihare bhikkhū | na ya ohāriṇiṃ vae /
text.102: bhāsādosaṃ parihare | māyaṃ ca vajjae sayā
text.103: na lavejja puṭho sāvajjaṃ | na niraṭhaṃ na mammayaṃ /
text.106: ego egatthie saddhiṃ | neva ciṭhe na saṃlave
text.107: jam me buddhāṇusāsanti | sīeṇa pharuseṇa vā /
text.108: mama lābho tti pehāe | payao taṃ paḍissuṇe
text.110: hiyaṃ taṃ maṇṇaī paṇṇo | besaṃ hoi asāhuṇo
text.111: hiyaṃ vigayabhayā buddhā | pharusaṃ pi aṇusāsaṇaṃ /
text.112: besaṃ taṃ hoi mūḍhāṇaṃ | khantisohikaraṃ payaṃ
text.115: kāleṇa nikkhame bhikkhū | kāleṇa ya paḍikkame /
text.116: akālaṃ ca vivajjittā | kāle kālaṃ samāyare
text.117: parivāḍīe na ciṭhejjā | bhikkhū dattesaṇaṃ care /
text.120: ego ciṭhejja bhattaṭhā | laṃghiyā taṃ naikkame
text.121: nāiucce na nīe vā | nāsanne nāidūrao /
text.125: sukaḍi tti supakki tti | succhinne suhaḍe maḍe /
text.126: suṇiṭhie suladdhi tti | sāvajjaṃ vajjae muṇī
text.127: ramae paṇḍie sāsaṃ | hayaṃ bhaddaṃ va vāhae /
text.128: bālaṃ sammai sāsanto | galiyassaṃ va vāhae
text.129: khaḍḍuyā me caveḍā me | akkosā ya vahā ya me /
text.131: putto me bhāya nāi tti | sāhū kallāṇa mannaī /
text.132: pāvadiṭhi u appāṇaṃ | sāsaṃ dāsu tti mannaī
text.133: na kovae āyariyaṃ | appāṇaṃ pi na kovae /
text.134: buddhovaghāī na siyā | na siyā tottagavesae
text.136: vijjhavejja paṃjalīuḍo | vaejja na puṇu tti ya
text.141: vitte acoie niccaṃ | khippaṃ havai sucoie /
text.143: naccā nayai mehāvī | loe kittī se jāyae /
text.144: havaī kiccāṇaṃ saraṇaṃ | bhūyāṇaṃ jagaī jahā
text.147: sa pujjasatthe suviṇīyasaṃsae | maṇoruī ciṭhai kammasaṃpayā /
text.150: siddhe vā havai sāsae | deve vā apparae mahiḍḍhie  tti bemi ||
text.153: suyaṃ me āusaṃ teṇaṃ bhagavayā evam akkhāyaṃ | iha khalu
text.154: bāvīsaṃ parīsahā samaṇeṇaṃ bhagavayā mahāvīreṇaṃ kāsaveṇaṃ
text.155: paveiyā, je bhikkhū soccā naccā jiccā abhibhūya bhikkhāyariyāe
text.156: paricvvayanto puṭho no niṇhavejjā | kayare te
text.157: khalu bāvīsaṃ parīsahā samaṇeṇaṃ bhagavayā mahāvīreṇaṃ
text.158: kāsaveṇaṃ paveiyā, je bhikkhū soccā naccā jiccā abhibhūya
text.159: bhikkhāyariyāe parivvayanto puṭho no niṇhavejjā | ime te
text.160: khalu bāvīsaṃ parīsahā samaṇeṇaṃ bhagavayā mahāvīreṇaṃ kāsaveṇaṃ
text.161: paveiyā, je bhikkhū soccā naccā jiccā abhibhūya bhikkhāyariyāe
text.162: parivvayanto puṭho no niṇhavejjā | taṃ jahā
text.171: taṃ bhe udāharissāmi | āṇupuvviṃ suṇeha me
text.173: na chinde na chindāvae | na pae na payāvae
text.180: 3 carantaṃ virayaṃ lūhaṃ | sīyaṃ phusai egayā /
text.182: na me nivāraṇam atthi | chavittāṇaṃ na vijjaī /
text.183: ahe tu aggiṃ sevāmi | ii bhikkhū na cintae
text.185: ghiṃsu vā pariyāveṇaṃ | sāyaṃ no paridevae
text.186: uṇhāhitatte mehāvī | siṇāṇaṃ vi no patthae /
text.187: gāyaṃ no parisiṃcejjā | na vīejjā ya appayaṃ
text.189: nāgo saṃgāmasīse vā | sūro abhihaṇe paraṃ
text.190: na saṃtase na vārejjā | maṇaṃ pi na paosae /
text.191: uvehe na haṇe pāṇe | bhuṃjante maṃsasoṇiyaṃ
text.193: aduvā sacele hokkhāmi | ii bhikkhū na cintae
text.195: eyaṃ dhammahiyaṃ naccā | nāṇī no paridevae
text.200: 8 saṃgo esa maṇūsāṇaṃ | jāo logaṃmi itthio /
text.201: jassa eyā parinnāyā | sukaḍaṃ tassa sāmaṇṇaṃ
text.202: eyam ādāya mehāvī | paṃkabhūyā u itthio /
text.204: 9 ega eva care lāḍhe | abhibhūya parīsahe /
text.205: gāme vā nagare vāvi | nigame vā rāyahāṇie
text.206: asamāṇe care bhikkhū | neva kujjā pariggahaṃ /
text.208: 10 susāṇe sunnagāre vā | rukkhamūle va egao /
text.209: akukkuo nisīejjā | na ya vittāsae paraṃ
text.211: saṃkābhīo na gacchejjā | uṭhittā annam āsaṇaṃũ
text.216: 12 akkosejjā pare bhikkhuṃ | na tesiṃ paḍisaṃjale /
text.217: sariso hoi bālāṇaṃ | tamhā bhikkhū na saṃjale
text.219: tusiṇīo uvehejjā | na tāo maṇasī kare
text.220: 13 hao na saṃjale bhikkhū | maṇaṃ pi na paosae /
text.221: titikkhaṃ paramaṃ naccā | bhikkhū dhammaṃ samāyare
text.222: samaṇaṃ saṃjayaṃ dantaṃ | haṇejjā koi katthaī /
text.223: natthi jīvassa nāsu tti | evaṃ pehejja saṃjae
text.224: 14 dukkaraṃ khalu bho niccaṃ | aṇagārassa bhikkhuṇo /
text.225: savvaṃ se jāiyaṃ hoi | natthi kiṃci ajāiyaṃ
text.227: seo agāravāsu tti | ii bhikkhū na cintae
text.229: laddhe piṇḍe aladdhe vā | nāṇutappejja paṇḍie
text.230: ajjevāhaṃ na labbhāmi | avi lābho sue siyā /
text.231: jo evaṃ paḍisaṃcikkhe | alābho taṃ na tajjae
text.235: evaṃ khu tassa sāmaṇṇaṃ | jaṃ na kujjā na kārave
text.239: evaṃ naccā na sevanti | tantujaṃ taṇatajjiyā
text.240: 18 kilinnagāe mehāvī | paṃkeṇa va raeṇa vā /
text.241: ghiṃsu vā pariyāveṇa | sāyaṃ no paridevae
text.243: jāva sarīrabheu tti | jallaṃ kāeṇa dhārae
text.245: je tāiṃ paḍisevanti | na tesiṃ pīhae muṇī
text.248: 20 se nūṇaṃ mae puvvaṃ | kammāṇāṇaphalā kaḍā /
text.255: evaṃ pi viharao me | chaumaṃ na niyaaī
text.256: 22 natthi nūṇaṃ pare loe | iḍḍhī vāvi tavassiṇo /
text.257: aduvā vaṃcio mi tti | ii bhikkhū na cintae
text.258: abhū jiṇā atthi jiṇā | aduvā vi bhavissaī /
text.259: musaṃ te evam āhaṃsu | ii bhikkhū na cintae
text.261: je bhikkhū na vihammejjā | puṭho keṇai kaṇhuī  tti bemi ||
text.265: māṇusattaṃ suī saddhā | saṃjamaṃmi ya vīriyaṃ
text.267: kammā nāṇāvihā kau | puḍho vissaṃbhiyā payā
text.273: na nivijjanti saṃsāre | savvaṭhesu va khattiyā
text.276: kammāṇaṃ tu pahāṇāe | āṇupuvvī kayāi u /
text.278: māṇussaṃ viggahaṃ laddhuṃ | suī dhammassa dullahā /
text.279: jaṃ soccā paḍivajjanti | tavaṃ khantim ahiṃsayaṃ
text.282: suiṃ ca laddhuṃ saddhaṃ ca | vīriyaṃ puṇa dullahaṃ /
text.283: bahave royamāṇā vi | no ya -aṃ paḍivajjae
text.284: māṇusattaṃmi āyāo | jo dhammaṃ socca saddahe /
text.285: tavassī vīriyaṃ laddhuṃ | saṃvuḍe niddhuṇe rayaṃ
text.287: nivvāṇaṃ paramaṃ jāi | ghayasitti vva pāvae
text.288: vigiṃca kammuṇo heuṃ | jasaṃ saṃciṇu khantie /
text.289: sarīraṃ pāḍhavaṃ hiccā | uḍḍhaṃ pakkamaī disaṃ
text.293: uḍḍhaṃ kappesu ciṭhanti | puvvā vāsasayā bahū
text.294: tattha ṭhiccā jahāṭhāṇaṃ | jakkhā āukkhae cuyā /
text.296: khettaṃ vatthuṃ hiraṇṇaṃ ca | pasavo dāsaporusaṃ /
text.298: mittavaṃ nāyavaṃ hoi | uccāgoe ya vaṇṇavaṃ /
text.303: tavasā dhuyakammaṃse | siddhe havai sāsae  tti bemi ||
text.306: asaṃkhayaṃ jīviya mā pamāyae | jarovaṇīyassa hu natthi tāṇaṃ /
text.307: evaṃ vijāṇāhi jaṇe pamatte | ki- -ū vihiṃsā ajayā gahinti
text.308: je pāvakammehi dhaṇaṃ maṇūsā | samāyayantī amaiṃ gahāya /
text.309: pahāya te pāsapayaie nare | verāṇubaddhā narayaṃ uventi
text.310: teṇe jahā sandhimuhe gahīe | sakammuṇā kiccai pāvakārī /
text.311: evaṃ payā pecca ihaṃ ca loe | kaḍāṇa kammāṇa na mukkha atthi
text.312: saṃsāram āvanna parassa aṭhā | sāhāraṇaṃ jaṃ ca karei kammaṃ /
text.313: kammassa te tassa u veyakāle | na bandhavā bandhavayaṃ uventi
text.314: vitteṇa tāṇaṃ na labhe pamatte | imaṃmi loe aduvā paratthā /
text.315: dīvappaṇaṭhe va aṇantamohe | neyāuyaṃ daṭhum adaṭhum eva
text.316: sattesu yāvī paḍibuddhajīvī | na vīsase paṇḍie āsupanne /
text.317: ghorā muhuttā abalaṃ sarīraṃ | bhāruṇḍapakkhī va carappamatte
text.318: care payāiṃ parisaṃkamāṇo | jaṃ kiṃci pāsaṃ iha maṇṇamāṇo /
text.319: lābhantare jīviya vūhaittā | pacchā parinnāya malāvadhaṃsī
text.320: chandaṃniroheṇa uvei mokkhaṃ | āse jahā sikkhiya vammadhārī /
text.321: puvvāiṃ vāsāiṃ carappamatte | tamhā muṇī khippam uvei mokkhaṃ
text.322: sa puvvam evaṃ na labhejja pacchā | esovamā sāsayavāiyāṇaṃ /
text.323: visīyaī siḍhile āuyaṃmi | kālovaṇīe sarīrassa bhee
text.324: khippaṃ na sakkei vivegameuṃ | tamhā samuṭhāya pahāya kāme /
text.325: samicca loyaṃ samayā mahesī | āyāṇurakkhī caramappamatte
text.326: muhuṃ muhuṃ mohaguṇe jayantaṃ | aṇegarūvā samaṇaṃ carantaṃ /
text.327: phāṃsā phusantī asamaṃjasaṃ ca | na tesi bhikkhū maṇasā pausse
text.328: mandā ya phāsā bahulohaṇijjā | tahappagāresu maṇaṃ na kujjā /
text.329: rakkhijja kohaṃ viṇaejja māṇaṃ | māyaṃ na seve payahejja lohaṃ
text.330: je 'saṃkhayā tucchā parappavāī | te pijjadosāṇugayā parabbhā /
text.331: ee ahamme tti duguṃchamāṇo | kaṃkhe guṇe jāva sarīrabheu  tti bemi ||
text.335: tattha ege mahāpanne | imaṃ paṇham udāhare
text.336: santime ya duve ṭhāṇā | akkhāyā māraṇantiyā /
text.338: bālāṇaṃ tu akāmaṃ tu | maraṇaṃ asaiṃ bhave /
text.339: paṇḍiyāṇaṃ sakāmaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa saiṃ bhave
text.341: kāmagiddhe jahā bāle | bhisaṃ kūrāiṃ kuvvaī
text.342: je giddhe kāmabhogesu | ege kūḍāya gacchaī /
text.343: na me diṭhe pare loe | cakkhudiṭhā imā raī
text.344: hatthāgayā ime kāmā | kāliyā je aṇāgayā /
text.345: ko jāṇai pare loe | atthi vā natthi vā puṇo
text.346: jaṇeṇa saddhiṃ hokkhāmi | ii bāle pagabbhaī /
text.348: tao se daṇḍaṃ samārabhaī | tasesu thāvaresu ya /
text.350: hiṃse bāle musāvāī | māille pisuṇe saḍhe /
text.351: bhuṃjamāṇe suraṃ maṃsaṃ | seyam eyaṃ ti mannaī
text.352: kāyasā vayasā matte | vitte giddhe ya itthisu /
text.353: duhao malaṃ saṃciṇai | siṃsuṇāgu vva maiyaṃ
text.356: suyā me narae ṭhāṇā | asīlāṇaṃ ca jā gaī /
text.360: jahā sāgaḍio jāṇaṃ | samaṃ hiccā mahāpahaṃ /
text.361: visamaṃ maggam oiṇṇo | akkhe bhaggaṃmi soyaī
text.363: bāle maccumuhaṃ patte | akkhe bhagge va soyaī
text.364: tao sa maraṇantaṃmi | bāle santasaī bhayā /
text.365: akāmamaraṇaṃ maraī | dhutte va kalinā jie
text.368: maraṇaṃ pi sapuṇṇāṇaṃ | jahā meyam aṇussuyaṃ /
text.370: na imaṃ savvesu bhikkhūsu | na imaṃ savvesu 'gārisu /
text.372: santi egehiṃ bhikkhūhiṃ | gāratthā saṃjam uttarā /
text.373: gāratthehi ya savvehiṃ | sāhavo saṃjam uttarā
text.375: eyāṇi vi na tāyanti | dussīlaṃ pariyāgayaṃ
text.376: piṇḍola evva dussīle | naragāo na muccaī /
text.377: bhikkhāe vā gihatthe vā | suvvae kammaī divaṃ
text.379: posahaṃ duhao pakkhaṃ | egarāyaṃ na hāvae
text.382: aha je saṃvuḍe bhikkhū | doṇhaṃ annayare siyā /
text.388: tāṇi ṭhāṇāṇi gacchanti | sikkhittā saṃjamaṃ tavaṃ /
text.389: bhikkhāge vā gihitthe vā | je santi paḍinivvuḍā
text.397: sakāmamaraṇaṃ maraī | tiṇham annayaraṃ muṇī  tti bemi ||
text.402: samikkha paṃḍie tamhā | pāsajāī pahe bahū /
text.403: appaṇā saccam esejjā | mettiṃ bhūesu kappae
text.404: māyā piyā nhusā bhāyā | bhajjā puttā ya orasā /
text.405: nālaṃ te mama tāṇāe | luppantassa sakammuṇā
text.407: chinda geddhiṃ siṇehaṃ ca | na kaṃkhe puvvasaṃthuyaṃ
text.410: ajjhatthaṃ savvao savvaṃ | dissa pāṇe piyāyae /
text.411: na haṇe pāṇiṇo pāṇe | bhayaverāo uvarae
text.412: āyāṇaṃ narayaṃ dissa | nāyaejja taṇām avi /
text.413: doguṃchī appaṇo pāe | dinnaṃ bhuṃjejja bhoyaṇaṃ
text.414: iham ege u mannanti | appaccakkhāya pāvagaṃ /
text.418: na cittā tāyae bhāsā | kuo vijjāṇusāsaṇaṃ /
text.420: je kei sarīre sattā | vaṇṇe rūve ya savvaso /
text.424: bahiyā uḍḍham ādāya | nāvakaṃkhe kayāi vi /
text.427: māyaṃ piṃḍassa pāṇassa | kaḍaṃ laddhūṇa bhakkhae
text.428: sannihiṃ ca na kuvvejjā | levamāyāe saṃjae /
text.435: oyaṇaṃ javasaṃ dejjā | posejjā vi sayaṃgaṇe
text.436: tao se puṭhe parivūḍhe | jāyamee mahodare /
text.438: jāva na ei āese | tāva jīvai so duhī /
text.439: aha pattaṃmi āese | sīsaṃ chettūṇa bhujjaī
text.440: jahā se khalu urabbhe | āesāe samīhie /
text.443: annadattahare teṇe | māī kaṃ nu hare saḍhe
text.447: āuyaṃ narae kaṃkhe | jahāesaṃ va elae
text.448: āsaṇaṃ sayaṇaṃ jāṇaṃ | vittaṃ kāme ya bhuṃjiyā /
text.449: dussāhaḍaṃ dhaṇaṃ hiccā | bahuṃ saṃciṇiyā rayaṃ
text.453: āsurīyaṃ disaṃ bālā | gacchanti avasā tamaṃ
text.454: jahā kāgaṇie heuṃ | sahassaṃ hārae naro /
text.455: apacchaṃ ambagaṃ bhoccā | rāyā rajjaṃ tu hārae
text.457: sahassaguṇiyā bhujjo | āuṃ kāmā ya divviyā
text.460: jahā ya tinni vāṇiyā | mūlaṃ ghettūṇa niggayā /
text.461: ego 'ttha lahaī lābhaṃ | ego mūleṇa āgao
text.462: ego mūlaṃ pi hārittā | āgao tattha vāṇio /
text.463: vavahāre uvamā esā | evaṃ dhamme viyāṇaha
text.464: māṇusattaṃ bhave mūlaṃ | lābho devagaī bhave /
text.467: devattaṃ māṇusattaṃ ca | jaṃ jie lolayāsaḍhe
text.468: tao jie saī hoi | duvihaṃ doggaiṃ gae /
text.470: evaṃ jiyaṃ sapehāe | tuliyā bālaṃ ca paṃḍiyaṃ /
text.471: mūliyaṃ te pavesanti | māṇusiṃ joṇim enti je
text.473: uventi māṇusaṃ joṇiṃ | kammasaccā hu pāṇiṇo
text.474: jesiṃ tu viulā sikkhā | mūliyaṃ te aicchithā /
text.476: evam addīṇavaṃ bhikkhuṃ | āgāriṃ ca viyāṇiyā /
text.477: kaha- -u jiccam elikkhaṃ | jiccamāṇe na saṃvide
text.478: jahā kusagge udagaṃ | samuddeṇa samaṃ miṇe /
text.481: kassa heuṃ purākāuṃ | jogakkhemaṃ na saṃvide
text.483: soccā neyāuyaṃ maggaṃ | jaṃ bhujjo paribhassaī
text.485: pūidehaniroheṇaṃ | bhave devi tti me suyaṃ
text.486: iḍḍhī juī jaso vaṇṇo | āuṃ suham aṇuttaraṃ /
text.487: bhujjo jattha maṇussesu | tattha se uvavajjaī
text.493: caiūṇa bālabhāvaṃ | abālaṃ sevaī muṇi  tti bemi ||
text.497: kiṃ nāma hojja taṃ kammayaṃ | jeṇāhaṃ doggaiṃ na gacchejjā
text.498: vijahittu puvvasaṃjoyaṃ | na siṇehaṃ kahiṃci kuvvejjā /
text.502: savvaṃ ganthaṃ kalahaṃ ca | vippajahe tahāvihaṃ bhikkhū /
text.503: savvesu kāmajāesu | pāsamāṇo na lippaī tāī
text.505: bāle ya mandie mūḍhe | bajjhaī macchiyā va khelaṃmi
text.506: dupariccayā ime kāmā | no sujahā adhīrapurisehiṃ /
text.507: aha santi suvvayā sāhū | je taranti ataraṃ vaṇiyā vā
text.508: samaṇā mu ege vayamāṇā | pāṇavahaṃ miyā ayāṇantā /
text.509: mandā nirayaṃ gacchanti | bālā pāviyāhiṃ diṭhīhiṃ
text.510: na hu pāṇavahaṃ aṇujāṇe | muccejja kayāi savvadukkhāṇaṃ /
text.511: evāriehiṃ akkhāyaṃ | jehiṃ imo sāhudhammo pannatto
text.512: pāṇe ya nāivāejjā | se samīi tti vuccaī tāī /
text.513: tao se pāvayaṃ kammaṃ | nijjāi udagaṃ va thalāo
text.515: no tesim ārabhe daṃḍaṃ | maṇasā vayasā kāyasā ceva
text.516: suddhesaṇāo naccāṇaṃ | tattha ṭhavejja bhikkhū appāṇaṃ /
text.517: jāyāe ghāsam esejjā | rasagiddhe na siyā bhikkhāe
text.519: adu vakkasaṃ pulāgaṃ vā | javaṇaṭhāe nisevae maṃghuṃ
text.520: je lakkhaṇaṃ ca suviṇaṃ | aṃgavijjaṃ ca je pauṃjanti /
text.521: na hu te samaṇā vuccanti | evaṃ āyariehiṃ akkhāyaṃ
text.524: tatto vi ya uvvaittā | saṃsāraṃ bahuṃ aṇupariyaḍanti /
text.526: kasiṇaṃ pi jo imaṃ loyaṃ | paḍipuṇṇaṃ dalejja ikkassa /
text.527: teṇāvi se na saṃtusse | ii duppūrae ime āyā
text.528: jahā lāhā tahā loho | lāhā loho pavaḍḍhaī /
text.529: domāsakayaṃ kajjaṃ | koḍīe vi na niṭhiyaṃ
text.531: jāo purisaṃ palobhittā | khellanti jahā va dāsehiṃ
text.533: dhammaṃ ca pesalaṃ naccā | tattha ṭhavejja bhikkhū appāṇaṃ
text.534: ii esa dhamme akkhāe | kavileṇaṃ ca visuddhapanneṇaṃ /
text.535: tarihinti je u kāhinti | tehiṃ ārāhiyā duve loga  tti bemi ||
text.540: jāiṃ sarittu bhayavaṃ | sahasaṃbuddho aṇuttare dhamme /
text.541: puttaṃ ṭhavettu rajje | abhiṇikkhamaī namī rāyā
text.543: bhuṃjittu namī rāyā | budho bhoge pariccayaī
text.544: mihilaṃ sapurajaṇavayaṃ | balam orohaṃ ca pariyaṇaṃ savvaṃ /
text.551: suvvanti dāruṇā saddā | pāsāesu gihesu ya
text.553: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.557: duhiyā asaraṇā attā | ee kandanti bho khagā
text.559: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.560: esa aggī ya vāū ya | eyaṃ ḍajjhai mandiraṃ /
text.563: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.564: suhaṃ vasāmo jīvāmo | jesi mo natthi kiṃcaṇa /
text.565: mihilāe ḍajjhamāṇīe | na me ḍajjhai kiṃcaṇa
text.567: piyaṃ na vijjaī kiṃci | appiyaṃ pi na vijjaī
text.568: bahuṃ khu muṇiṇo bhaddaṃ | aṇagārassa bhikkhuṇo /
text.571: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.575: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.578: dhaṇuṃ parakkamaṃ kiccā | jīvaṃ ca iriyaṃ sayā /
text.579: dhiiṃ ca keyaṇaṃ kiccā | sacceṇa palimanthae
text.583: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.587: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.588: saṃsayaṃ khalu so kuṇaī | jo maggo kuṇaī gharaṃ /
text.589: jattheva gantum icchejjā | tattha kuvvejja sāsayaṃ
text.591: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.592: āmose lomahāre ya | gaṃṭhibhee ya takkare /
text.593: nagarassa khemaṃ kāūṇaṃ | tao gacchasi khattiyā
text.595: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.596: asaiṃ tu maṇussehiṃ | micchā daṃḍo pajuṃjaī /
text.599: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.600: je kei patthivā tujjhaṃ | nānamanti narāhivā /
text.601: vase te ṭhāvaittāṇaṃ | tao gacchasi khattiyā
text.603: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.604: jo sahassaṃ sahassāṇaṃ | saṃgāme dujjae jiṇe /
text.605: egaṃ jiṇejja appāṇaṃ | esa se paramo jao
text.606: appāṇam eva jujjhāhi | kiṃ te jujjheṇa bajjhao /
text.608: paṃcindiyāṇi kohaṃ | māṇaṃ māyaṃ taheva lohaṃ ca /
text.609: dujjayaṃ ceva appāṇaṃ | savvaṃ appe jie jiyaṃ
text.611: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.613: dattā bhoccā ya jiṭhā ya | tao gacchasi khattiyā
text.615: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.616: jo sahassaṃ sahassāṇaṃ | māse māse gavaṃ dae /
text.617: tassa vi saṃjamo seo | adintassa vi kiṃcaṇa
text.619: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.623: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.624: māse māse tu jo bālo | kusaggeṇa tu bhuṃjae /
text.625: na so sukkhāyadhammassa | kalaṃ agghai solasiṃ
text.627: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.628: hiraṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ maṇimuttaṃ | kaṃsaṃ dūsaṃ ca vāhaṇaṃ /
text.631: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.632: suvaṇṇaruppassa u pavvayā bhave | siyā hu kelāsasamā asaṃkhayā /
text.633: narassa luddhassa na tehiṃ kiṃci | icchā u āgāsasamā aṇantiyā
text.634: puḍhavī sālī javā ceva | hiraṇṇaṃ pasubhis saha /
text.635: paḍipuṇṇaṃ nālam egassa | ii vijjā tavaṃ care
text.637: tao namiṃ rāyarisiṃ | devindo iṇam abbavī
text.641: tao namī rāyarisī | devindaṃ iṇam abbavī
text.642: sallaṃ kāmā visaṃ kāmā | kāmā āsīvisovamā /
text.644: ahe vayanti koheṇaṃ | māṇeṇaṃ ahamā gaī /
text.648: aho te nijjio koho | aho māṇo parājio /
text.649: aho nirakkiyā māyā | aho lobho vasīkao
text.650: aho te ajjavaṃ sāhu | aho te sāhu maddavaṃ /
text.651: aho te uttamā khantī | aho te mutti uttamā
text.652: ihaṃ si uttamo bhante | pacchā hohisi uttamo /
text.653: loguttam uttamaṃ ṭhāṇaṃ | siddhiṃ gacchasi nīrao
text.655: payāhiṇaṃ karento | puṇo puṇo vandaī sakko
text.658: namī namei appāṇaṃ | sakkhaṃ sakkeṇa coio /
text.661: viṇiyaanti bhogesu | jahā se namī rāyarisī  tti bemi ||
text.664: dumapattae paṇḍuyae jahā | nivaḍai rāigaṇāṇa accae /
text.665: evaṃ maṇuyāṇa jīviyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.666: kusagge jaha osabindue | thovaṃ ciṭhai lambamāṇae /
text.667: evaṃ maṇuyāṇa jīviyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.669: vihuṇāhi rayaṃ pure kaḍaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.670: dullahe khalu māṇuse bhave | cirakāleṇa vi savvapāṇiṇaṃ /
text.671: gāḍhā ya vivāga kammuṇo | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.673: kālaṃ saṃkhāīyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.674: āukkāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.675: kālaṃ saṃkhāīyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.676: teukkāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.677: kālaṃ saṃkhāīyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.678: vāukkāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.679: kālaṃ saṃkhāīyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.680: vaṇassaikāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.681: kālam aṇantadurantayaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.682: beindiyakāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.683: kālaṃ saṃkhijjasanniyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.684: teindiyakāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.685: kālaṃ saṃkhijjasanniyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.686: caurindiyakāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.687: kālaṃ saṃkhijjasanniyaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.688: paṃcindiyakāyam aigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.690: deve neraie yamaigao | ukkosaṃ jīvo u saṃvase /
text.693: jīvo pamāyabahulo | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.694: laddhūṇa vi māṇusattaṇaṃ | āriattaṃ puṇarāvi dullahaṃ /
text.695: bahave dasuyā milakkhuyā | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.696: laddhūṇa vi āriyattaṇaṃ | ahīṇapaṃcendiyayā hu dullahā /
text.697: vigalindiyayā hu dīsaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.698: ahīṇapaṃcendiyattaṃ pi se lahe | uttamadhammasuī hu dullahā /
text.699: kutitthinisevae jaṇe | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.700: laddhūṇa vi uttamaṃ suiṃ | saddahaṇā puṇarāvi dullahā /
text.701: micchattanisevae jaṇe | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.702: dhammaṃ pi hu saddahantayā | dullahayā kāeṇa phāsayā /
text.703: iha kāmaguṇehi mucchiyā | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.704: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.705: se soyabale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.706: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.707: se cakkhubale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.708: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.709: se ghāṇabale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.710: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.711: se jibbhabale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.712: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.713: se phāsabale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.714: parijūrai te sarīrayaṃ | kesā paṇḍurayā havanti te /
text.715: se savvabale ya hāyaī | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.716: araī gaṇḍaṃ visūiyā | āyaṃkā vivihā phusanti te /
text.717: vihaḍai viddhaṃsai te sarīrayaṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.718: vocchinda siṇeham appaṇo | kumuyaṃ sāraiyaṃ va pāṇiyaṃ /
text.719: se savvasiṇehavajjie | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.720: ciccāṇa dhaṇaṃ ca bhāriyaṃ | pavvaio hi si aṇagāriyaṃ /
text.721: mā vantaṃ puṇo vi āie | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.723: mā taṃ biiyaṃ gavesae | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.724: na hu jiṇe ajja dissaī | bahumae dissai maggadesie /
text.725: saṃpai neyāue pahe | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.726: avasohiya kaṇagā pahaṃ | oiṇṇo si pahaṃ mahālayaṃ /
text.727: gacchasi maggaṃ visohiyā | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.728: abale jaha bhāravāhae | mā magge visame vagāhiyā /
text.729: pacchā pacchāṇutāvae | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.730: tiṇṇo hu si aṇṇavaṃ mahaṃ | kiṃ puṇa ciṭhasi tīram āgao /
text.731: abhitura pāraṃ gamittae | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.732: akalevaraseṇim ussiyā | siddhiṃ goyama loyaṃ gacchasi /
text.733: khemaṃ ca sivaṃ aṇuttaraṃ | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.734: buddhe parinivvuḍe care | gāmagae nagare va saṃjae /
text.735: santīmaggaṃ ca vūhae | samayaṃ goyama mā pamāyae
text.737: rāgaṃ dosaṃ ca chindiyā | siddhigaiṃ gae goyame  tti bemi ||
text.742: je yāvi hoi nivvijje | thaddhe luddhe aṇiggahe /
text.744: aha paṃcahiṃ ṭhāṇehiṃ | jehiṃ sikkhā na labbhaī /
text.746: aha aṭhahiṃ ṭhāṇehiṃ | sikkhāsīli tti vuccaī /
text.747: ahassire sayā dante | na ya mammam udāhare
text.748: nāsīle na visīle | na siyā ailolue /
text.750: aha coddasahiṃ ṭhāṇehiṃ | vaamāṇe u saṃjae /
text.751: aviṇīe vuccaī so u | nivvāṇaṃ ca na gacchai
text.752: abhikkhaṇaṃ kohī havai | pabandhaṃ ca pakuvvaī /
text.758: aha pannarasahiṃ ṭhāṇehiṃ | suviṇīe tti vuccaī /
text.760: appaṃ ca ahikkhivaī | pabandhaṃ ca na kuvvaī /
text.761: mettijjamāṇo bhayaī | suyaṃ laddhuṃ na majjaī
text.762: na ya pāvaparikkhevī | na ya mittesu kuppaī /
text.767: piyaṃkare piyaṃvāī | se sikkhaṃ laddhum arihaī
text.768: jahā saṃkhammi payaṃ | nihiyaṃ duhao vi virāyai /
text.769: evaṃ bahussue bhikkhū | dhammo kittī tahā suyaṃ
text.770: jahā se kamboyāṇaṃ | āiṇṇe kanthae siyā /
text.771: āse javeṇa pavare | evaṃ havai bahussue
text.779: sīhe miyāṇa pavare | evaṃ havai bahussue
text.787: jalante iva teeṇa | evaṃ havai bahussue
text.792: jahā sā dumāṇa pavarā | jambū nāma sudaṃsaṇā /
text.794: jahā sā naīṇa pavarā | salilā sāgaraṃgamā /
text.796: jahā se nagāṇa pavare | sumahaṃ mandare girī /
text.801: suyassa puṇṇā viulassa tāiṇo | khavittu kammaṃ gaim uttamaṃ gayā
text.803: jeṇappāṇaṃ paraṃ ceva | siddhiṃ saṃpāuṇejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.816: kayare āgacchai dittarūve | kāle vigarāle phokkanāse /
text.818: ko re tuvaṃ iya adaṃsaṇijje | kāe va āsāihamāgao si /
text.819: omacelayā paṃsupisāyabhūyā | gaccha kkhalāhi kim ihaṃ ṭhio si
text.820: jakkhe tahiṃ tinduyarukkhavāsī | aṇukampao tassa mahāmuṇissa /
text.821: pacchāyaittā niyagaṃ sarīraṃ | imāiṃ vayaṇāim udāharitthā
text.822: samaṇo ahaṃ saṃjao bambhayārī | virao dhaṇapayaṇapariggahāo /
text.823: parappavittassa u bhikkhakāle | annassa aṭhā ihamāgao mi
text.824: viyarijjai khajjai bhujjaī | annaṃ pabhūyaṃ bhavayāṇam eyaṃ /
text.825: jāṇeha me jāyaṇajīviṇu tti | sesāvasesaṃ labhaū tavassī
text.826: uvakkhaḍaṃ bhoyaṇa māhaṇāṇaṃ | attaṭhiyaṃ siddham ihegapakkhaṃ /
text.827: na ū vayaṃ erisam annapāṇaṃ | dāhāmu tujjhaṃ kim ihaṃ ṭhiosi
text.828: thalesu bīyāi vavanti kāsagā | taheva ninnesu ya āsasāe /
text.829: eyāe saddhāe dalāha majjhaṃ | ārāhae puṇṇam iṇaṃ khu khittaṃ
text.830: khettāṇi amhaṃ viiyāṇi loe | jahiṃ pakiṇṇā viruhanti puṇṇā /
text.831: je māhaṇā jāivijjovaveyā | tāiṃ tu khettāi supesalāiṃ
text.832: koho ya māṇo ya vaho ya jesiṃ | mosaṃ adattaṃ ca pariggahaṃ ca /
text.833: te māhaṇā jāivijjāvihūṇā | tāiṃ tu khettāi supāvayāiṃ
text.834: tubbhettha bho bhāradharā girāṇaṃ | aṭhaṃ na jāṇeha ahijja vee /
text.835: uccāvayāiṃ muṇiṇo caranti | tāiṃ tu khettāi supesalāiṃ
text.836: ajjhāvayāṇaṃ paḍikūlabhāsī | pabhāsase kiṃ tu sagāsi amhaṃ /
text.837: avi eyaṃ viṇassau annapāṇaṃ | na ya -aṃ dāhāmu tumaṃ niyaṇṭhā
text.838: samiīhi majjhaṃ susamāhiyassa | guttīhi guttassa jiindiyassa /
text.839: jai me na dāhittha ahesaṇijjaṃ | kim ajja jannāṇa lahittha lāhaṃ
text.840: ke ettha khattā uvajoiyā vā | ajjhāvayā vā saha khaṇḍiehiṃ /
text.841: eyaṃ daṇḍeṇa phalaeṇa hantā | kaṇṭhammi ghettūṇa khalejja jo -aṃ
text.842: ajjhāvayāṇaṃ vayaṇaṃ suṇettā | uddhāiyā tattha bahū kumārā /
text.843: daṇḍehi vittehi kasehi ceva | samāgayā taṃ isi tālayanti
text.844: ranno tahiṃ kosaliyassa dhūyā | bhadda tti nāmeṇa aṇindiyaṃgī /
text.845: taṃ pāsiyā saṃjaya hammamāṇaṃ | kuddhe kumāre parinivvavei
text.846: devābhiogeṇa nioieṇaṃ | dinnā mu rannā maṇasā na jhāyā /
text.847: narindadevindabhivandieṇaṃ | jeṇam hi vantā isiṇā sa eso
text.848: eso hu so uggatavo mahappā | jitindio saṃjao bambhayārī /
text.849: jo me tayā necchai dijjamāṇiṃ | piuṇā sayaṃ kosalieṇa rannā
text.850: mahājaso eso mahāṇubhāgo | ghoravvao ghoraparakkamo ya /
text.851: mā eyaṃ hīleha ahīlaṇijjaṃ | mā savve teeṇa bhe niddahejjā
text.852: eyāiṃ tīse vayaṇāi soccā | pattīi bhaddāi suhāsiyāiṃ /
text.854: te ghorarūvā ṭhiya antalikkhe | 'surā tahiṃ taṃ jaṇa tālayanti /
text.855: te bhinnadehe ruhiraṃ vamante | pāsittu bhaddā iṇam āhu bhujjo
text.856: giriṃ nahehiṃ khaṇaha | ayaṃ dantehiṃ khāyaha /
text.857: jāyateyaṃ pāehi haṇaha | je bhikkhuṃ avamannaha
text.858: āsīviso uggatavo mahesī | ghoravvao ghoraparakkamo ya /
text.859: agaṇiṃ va pakkhanda payaṃgaseṇā | je bhikkhuyaṃ bhattakāle vaheha
text.860: sīseṇa eyaṃ saraṇaṃ uveha | samāgayā savvajaṇeṇa tubbhe /
text.861: jai icchaha jīviyaṃ vā dhaṇaṃ vā | logaṃ pi eso kuvio ḍahejjā
text.863: nijjheriyacche ruhiraṃ vamante | uddhaṃ muhe niggayajīhanette
text.864: te pāsiyā khaṇḍiyakaṭhabhūe | vimaṇo visaṇṇo aha māhaṇo so /
text.865: isiṃ pasāei sabhāriyāo | hīlaṃ ca nindaṃ ca khamāha bhante
text.866: bālehi mūḍhehi ayāṇaehiṃ | jaṃ hīliyā tassa khamāha bhante /
text.867: mahappasāyā isiṇo havanti | na hu muṇī kovaparā havanti
text.868: puvviṃ ca iṇhiṃ ca aṇāgayaṃ ca | maṇappadoso na me atthi koi /
text.869: jakkhā hu veyāvaḍiyaṃ karenti | tamhā hu ee nihayā kumārā
text.870: atthaṃ ca dhammaṃ ca viyāṇamāṇā | tubbhaṃ na vi kuppaha bhūipannā /
text.871: tubbhaṃ tu pāe saraṇaṃ uvemo | samāgayā savvajaṇeṇa amhe
text.872: accemu te mahābhāga | na te kiṃci na accimo /
text.874: imaṃ ca me atthi pabhūyam annaṃ | taṃ bhuṃjasū amha aṇuggahaṭhā /
text.875: bāḍhaṃ ti paḍicchai bhattapāṇaṃ | māsassa ū pāraṇae mahappā
text.876: tahiyaṃ gandhodayapupphavāsaṃ | divvā tahiṃ vasuhārā ya vuṭhā /
text.877: pahayāo dunduhīo surehiṃ | āgāse aho dāṇaṃ ca ghuṭhaṃ
text.878: sakkhaṃ khu dīsai tavoviseso | na dīsaī jāivisesa koī /
text.880: kiṃ māhaṇā joisamārabhantā | udaeṇa sohiṃ bahiyā vimaggaha /
text.881: jaṃ maggahā bāhiriyaṃ visohiṃ | na taṃ suiṭhaṃ kusalā vayanti
text.882: kusaṃ ca jūvaṃ taṇakaṭham aggiṃ | sāyaṃ ca pāyaṃ udagaṃ phusantā /
text.883: pāṇāi bhūyāi viheḍayantā | bhujjo vi mandā pagareha pāvaṃ
text.884: kahaṃ ca re bhikkhu vayaṃ jayāmo | pāvāi kammāi puṇollayāmo /
text.885: akkhāhi -e saṃjaya jakkhapūiyā | kahaṃ sujaṭhaṃ kusalā vayanti
text.886: chajjīvakāe asamārabhantā | mosaṃ adattaṃ ca asevamāṇā /
text.887: pariggahaṃ itthio māṇamāyaṃ | eyaṃ parinnāya caranti dantā
text.888: susaṃvuḍā paṃcahi saṃvarehiṃ | iha jīviyaṃ aṇavakaṃkhamāṇā /
text.890: ke te joī ke va te joiṭhāṇe | kā te suyā kiṃ va te kārisaṃgaṃ /
text.891: ehā ya te kayarā santi bhikkhū | kayareṇa homeṇa huṇāsi joiṃ
text.892: tavo joī jīvo joiṭhāṇaṃ | jogā suyā sarīraṃ kārisaṃgaṃ /
text.893: kammehā saṃjamajogasantī | homaṃ huṇāmi isiṇaṃ pasatthaṃ
text.894: ke te harae ke ya te santititthe | kahiṃ siṇāo va rayaṃ jahāsi /
text.895: āikkha -e saṃjaya jakkhapūiyā | icchāmo nāuṃ bhavao sagāse
text.896: dhamme harae bambhe santititthe | aṇāvile attapasannalese /
text.897: jahiṃ siṇāo vimalo visuddho | susīibhūo pajahāmi dosaṃ
text.898: eyaṃ siṇāṇaṃ kusalehi diṭhaṃ | mahāsiṇāṇa isiṇaṃ pasatthaṃ /
text.899: jahi siṇāyā vimalā visuddhā | mahārisī uttamaṃ ṭhāṇaṃ patta  tti bemi ||
text.902: jāīparāio khalu | kāsi niyāṇaṃ tu hatthiṇapurammi /
text.904: kampille sambhūo | citto puṇa jāo purimatālammi /
text.906: kampillammi ya nayare | samāgayā do vi cittasambhūyā /
text.910: āsīmu bhāyaro do vi | annam annavasāṇugā /
text.912: dāsā dasaṇṇe āsīmu | miyā kāliṃjare nage /
text.914: devā ya devalogammi | āsi amhe mahiḍḍhiyā /
text.915: imā no chaṭhiyā jāī | annamanneṇa jā viṇā
text.919: te ajja paribhuṃjāmo | kiṃ tu citte vi se tahā
text.920: savvaṃ suciṇṇaṃ saphalaṃ narāṇaṃ | kaḍāṇa kammāṇa na mokkha atthi /
text.921: atthehi kāmehi ya uttamehiṃ | āyā mamaṃ puṇṇaphalovavee
text.923: cittaṃ pi jāṇāhi taheva rāyaṃ | iḍḍhī juī tassa vi ya ppabhūyā
text.925: jaṃ bhikkhuṇo sīlaguṇovaveyā | ihaṃ jayante samaṇo mi jāo
text.926: uccoyae mahu kakke ya bambhe | paveiyā āvasahā ya rammā /
text.927: imaṃ gihaṃ citta dhaṇappabhūyaṃ | pasāhi paṃcālaguṇovaveyaṃ
text.928: naehi gīehi ya vāiehiṃ | nārījaṇāhiṃ pariyārayanto /
text.929: bhuṃjāhi bhogāi imāi bhikkhū | mama royaī pavvajjā hu dukkhaṃ
text.930: taṃ puvvaneheṇa kayāṇurāgaṃ | narāhivaṃ kāmaguṇesu giddhaṃ /
text.931: dhammassio tassa hiyāṇupehī | citto imaṃ vayaṇam udāharitthā
text.932: savvaṃ vilaviyaṃ gīyaṃ | savvaṃ naaṃ viḍambiyaṃ /
text.933: savve ābharaṇā bhārā | savve kāmā duhāvahā
text.934: bālābhirāmesu duhāvahesu | na taṃ suhaṃ kāmaguṇesu rāyaṃ /
text.935: virattakāmāṇa tavohaṇāṇaṃ | jaṃ bhikkhuṇaṃ sīlaguṇe rayāṇaṃ
text.936: nariṃda jāī ahamā narāṇaṃ | sovāgajāī duhao gayāṇaṃ /
text.937: jahiṃ vayaṃ savvajaṇassa vessā | vasī ya sovāganivesaṇesu
text.938: tīse ya jāīi u pāviyāe | vucchāmu sovāganivesaṇesu /
text.939: savvassa logassa dugaṃchaṇijjā | ihaṃ tu kammāi pure kaḍāiṃ
text.940: so dāṇi siṃ rāya mahāṇubhāgo | mahiḍḍhio puṇṇaphalovaveo /
text.942: iha jīvie rāya asāsayammi | dhaṇiyaṃ tu puṇṇāi akuvvamāṇo /
text.943: se soyaī maccumuhovaṇīe | dhammaṃ akāūṇa paraṃsi loe
text.944: jaheha sīho va miyaṃ gahāya | maccū naraṃ nei hu antakāle /
text.945: na tassa māyā va piyā va bhāyā | kālammi tammaṃsaharā bhavaṃti
text.946: na tassa dukkhaṃ vibhayanti nāio | na mittavaggā na suyā na baṃdhavā /
text.947: ekko sayaṃ paccaṇuhoi dukkhaṃ | kattāram eva aṇujāi kammaṃ
text.948: ceccā dupayaṃ ca cauppayaṃ ca | khettaṃ gihaṃ dhaṇadhannaṃ ca savvaṃ /
text.949: sakammabīo avaso payāi | paraṃ bhavaṃ suṃdara pāvagaṃ vā
text.950: taṃ ekkaṃ tucchasarīragaṃ se | ciīgayaṃ dahiya u pāvageṇaṃ /
text.951: bhajjā ya puttāvi ya nāyao ya | dāyāram annaṃ aṇusaṃkamanti
text.952: uvaṇijjaī jīviyam appamāyaṃ | vaṇṇaṃ jarā harai narassa rāya /
text.953: paṃcālarāyā vayaṇaṃ suṇāhi | mā kāsi kammāi mahālayāiṃ
text.954: ahaṃ pi jāṇāmi jaheha sāhū | jaṃ me tumaṃ sāhasi vakkam eyaṃ /
text.955: bhogā ime saṃgakarā havanti | je dujjayā ajjo amhārisehiṃ
text.958: tassa me apaḍikantassa | imaṃ eyārisaṃ phalaṃ /
text.959: jāṇamāṇo vi jaṃ dhammaṃ | kāmabhogesu mucchio
text.960: nāgo jahā paṃkajalāvasanno | daṭhuṃ thalaṃ nābhisamei tīraṃ /
text.961: evaṃ vayaṃ kāmaguṇesu giddhā | na bhikkhuṇo maggam aṇuvvayāmo
text.962: accei kālo taranti rāio | na yāvi bhogā purisāṇa niccā /
text.963: uvicca bhogā purisaṃ cayanti | dumaṃ jahā khīṇaphalaṃ va pakkhī
text.964: jai taṃ si bhoge caiuṃ asatto | ajjāi kammāi karehi rāyaṃ /
text.965: dhamme ṭhio savvapayāṇukampī | to hohisi devo io viuvvī
text.966: na tujjha bhoge caiūṇa buddhī | giddho si ārambhapariggahesu /
text.967: mohaṃ kao ettiu vippalāvu | gacchāmi rāyaṃ āmantio si
text.968: paṃcālarāyā vi ya bambhadatto | sāhussa tassa vayaṇaṃ akāuṃ /
text.969: aṇuttare bhuṃjiya kāmabhoge | aṇuttare so narae paviṭho
text.970: citto vi kāmehi virattakāmo | udaggacārittatavo mahesī /
text.971: aṇuttaraṃ saṃjama pālaittā | aṇuttaraṃ siddhigaiṃ gao  tti bemi ||
text.974: devā bhavittāṇa pure bhavammī | keī cuyā egavimāṇavāsī /
text.975: pure purāṇe usuyāranāme | khāe samiddhe suralogaramme
text.976: sakammaseseṇa purākaeṇaṃ | kulesudaggesu ya te pasūyā /
text.978: pumattam āgamma kumāra do vī | purohio tassa jasā ya pattī /
text.979: visālakittī ya tahosuyāro | rāyattha devī kamalāvaī ya
text.981: saṃsāracakkassa vimokkhaṇatthā | datthūṇa te kāmaguṇe virattā
text.982: piyaputtagā donni vi māhaṇassa | sakammasīlassa purohiyassa /
text.983: sarittu porāṇiya tattha jāiṃ | tahā suciṇṇaṃ tavasaṃjamaṃ ca
text.984: te kāmabhogesu asajjamāṇā | māṇussaesuṃ je yāvi divvā /
text.985: mokkhābhikaṃkhī abhijāyasaḍḍhā | tāyaṃ uvāgamma imaṃ udāhu
text.986: asāsayaṃ datthu imaṃ vihāraṃ | bahuantarāyaṃ na ya dīham āuṃ /
text.987: tamhā gihaṃsi na raiṃ lahāmo | āmantayāmo carissāmu moṇaṃ
text.988: aha tāyago tattha muṇīṇa tesiṃ | tavassa vāghāyakaraṃ vayāsī /
text.989: imaṃ vayaṃ veyavio vayanti | jahā na hoī asuyāṇa logo
text.990: ahijja vee parivissa vippe | putte pariṭhappa gihaṃsi jāyā /
text.991: bhoccāṇa bhoe saha itthiyāhiṃ | āraṇṇagā hoha muṇī pasatthā
text.993: saṃtattabhāvaṃ paritappamāṇaṃ | lālappamāṇaṃ bahuhā bahuṃ ca
text.994: purohiyaṃ taṃ kamaso 'uṇintaṃ | nimaṃtayantaṃ ca sue dhaṇeṇaṃ ũ/
text.995: jahakkamaṃ kāmaguṇehi ceva | kumāragā te pasamikkha vakkaṃ
text.996: veyā ahīyā na bhavanti tāṇaṃ | bhuttā diyā ninti tamaṃ tameṇaṃ ũ/
text.997: jāyā ya puttā na havanti tāṇaṃ | ko -āma te aṇumannejja eyaṃ
text.999: saṃsāramokkhassa vipakkhabhūyā | khāṇī aṇatthāṇa u kāmabhogā
text.1000: parivvayante aṇiyattakāme | aho ya rāo paritappamāṇe /
text.1001: annappamatte dhaṇam esamāṇe | pappoti maccuṃ purise jaraṃ ca
text.1002: imaṃ ca me atthi imaṃ ca natthi | imaṃ ca me kicca imaṃ akiccaṃ /
text.1003: taṃ evamevaṃ lālappamāṇaṃ | harā haraṃti tti kahaṃ pamāe
text.1004: dhaṇaṃ pabhūyaṃ saha itthiyāhiṃ | sayaṇā tahā kāmaguṇā pagāmā /
text.1005: tavaṃ kae tappai jassa logo | taṃ savvasāhīṇam iheva tubbhaṃ
text.1006: dhaṇeṇa kiṃ dhammadhurāhigāre | sayaṇeṇa vā kāmaguṇehi ceva /
text.1007: samaṇā bhavissāmu guṇohadhārī | bahiṃvihārā abhigamma bhikkhaṃ
text.1008: jahā ya aggī araṇī asanto | khīre ghayaṃ tellam ahā tilesu /
text.1009: emeva tāyā sarīraṃsi sattā | saṃmucchaī nāsai nāvaciṭhe
text.1010: no indiyaggejjha amuttabhāvā | amuttabhāvā vi ya hoi nicco /
text.1011: ajjhatthaheuṃ niyayassa bandho | saṃsāraheuṃ ca vayanti bandhaṃ
text.1012: jahā vayaṃ dhammam ajāṇamāṇā | pāvaṃ purā kammam akāsi mohā /
text.1013: orubbhamāṇā parirakkhiyantā | taṃ neva bhujjo vi samāyarāmo
text.1015: amohāhiṃ paḍantīhiṃ | gihaṃsi na raiṃ labhe
text.1016: keṇa abbhāhao logo | keṇa vā parivārio /
text.1017: kā vā amohā vuttā | jāyā ciṃtāvaro hume
text.1019: amohā rayaṇī vuttā | evaṃ tāya vijāṇaha
text.1020: jā jā vaccai rayaṇī | na sā paḍiniyattaī /
text.1022: jā jā vaccai rayaṇī | na sā paḍiniyattaī /
text.1023: dhammaṃ ca kuṇamāṇassa | saphalā janti rāio
text.1025: pacchā jāyā gamissāmo | bhikkhamāṇā kule kule
text.1026: jassatthi maccuṇā sakkhaṃ | jassa catthi palāyaṇaṃ /
text.1027: jo jāṇe na marissāmi | so hu kaṃkhe sue siyā
text.1028: ajjeva dhammaṃ paḍivajjayāmo | jahiṃ pavannā na puṇabbhavāmo /
text.1029: aṇāgayaṃ neva ya atthi kiṃcī | saddhākhamaṃ -e viṇaittu rāgaṃ
text.1030: pahīṇaputtassa hu natthi vāso | vāsiṭhi bhikkhāyariyāi kālo /
text.1031: sāhāhi rukkho lahaī samāhiṃ | chinnāhi sāhāhi tam eva khāṇuṃ
text.1032: paṃkhāvihūṇo vva jaheva pakkhī | bhiccavihūṇo vva raṇe narindo /
text.1033: vivannasāro vaṇio vva poe | pahīṇaputto mi tahā ahaṃ pi
text.1034: susaṃbhiyā kāmaguṇā ime te | saṃpiṇḍiyā aggarasappabhūyā /
text.1035: bhuṃjāmu tā kāmaguṇe pagāmaṃ | pacchā gamissāmu pahāṇamaggaṃ
text.1036: bhuttā rasā bhoi jahāi -e vao | na jīviyaṭhā pajahāmi bhoe /
text.1037: lābhaṃ alābhaṃ ca suhaṃ ca dukkhaṃ | saṃcikkhamāṇo carissāmi moṇaṃ
text.1038: mā hū tumaṃ soyariyāṇa sambhare | juṇṇo va haṃso paḍisottagāmī /
text.1039: bhuṃjāhi bhogāi mae samāṇaṃ | dukkhaṃ khu bhikkhāyariyāvihāro
text.1040: jahā ya bhoī taṇuyaṃ bhuyaṃgo | nimmoyaṇiṃ hicca palei mutto /
text.1041: em ee jāyā payahanti bhoe | te haṃ kahaṃ nāṇugamissam ekko
text.1042: chindittu jālaṃ abalaṃ va rohiyā | macchā jahā kāmaguṇe pahāya /
text.1043: dhoreyasīlā tavasā udārā | dhīrā hu bhikkhāyariyaṃ caranti
text.1044: naheva kuṃcā samaikkamantā | tayāṇi jālāṇi dalittu haṃsā /
text.1045: palenti puttā ya paī ya majjhaṃ | te haṃ kahaṃ nāṇugamissam ekkā
text.1046: purohiyaṃ taṃ sasuyaṃ sadāraṃ | soccā 'bhinikkhamma pahāya bhoe /
text.1047: kuḍumbasāraṃ viuluttamaṃ ca | rāyaṃ abhikkhaṃ samuvāya devī
text.1048: vantāsī puriso rāyaṃ | na so hoi pasaṃsio /
text.1050: savvaṃ jagaṃ jai tuhaṃ | savvaṃ vāvi dhaṇaṃ bhave /
text.1051: savvaṃ pi te apajjattaṃ | neva tāṇāya taṃ tava
text.1052: marihisi rāyaṃ jayā tayā vā | maṇorame kāmaguṇe vihāya /
text.1053: ekko hu dhammo naradeva tāṇaṃ | na vijjaī annam iheha kiṃci
text.1054: nāhaṃ rame pakkhiṇi paṃjare vā | saṃtāṇachinnā carissāmi moṇaṃ /
text.1062: ime ya baddhā phandanti | mama hatthajjamāgayā /
text.1063: vayaṃ ca sattā kāmesu | bhavissāmo jahā ime
text.1067: urago suvaṇṇapāse vva | saṃkamāṇo taṇuṃ care
text.1068: nāgo vva bandhaṇaṃ chittā | appaṇo vasahiṃ vae /
text.1069: eyaṃ pacchaṃ mahārāyaṃ | ussuyāri tti me suyaṃ
text.1070: caittā viulaṃ rajjaṃ | kāmabhoge ya duccae /
text.1072: sammaṃ dhammaṃ viyāṇittā | ceccā kāmaguṇe vare /
text.1074: evaṃ te kamaso buddhā | savve dhammaparāyaṇā /
text.1078: rāyā saha devīe | māhaṇo ya purohio /
text.1079: māhaṇī dāragā ceva | savve te parinivvuḍa  tti bemi ||
text.1082: moṇaṃ carissāmi samicca dhammaṃ | sahie ujjukaḍe niyāṇachinne /
text.1083: saṃthavaṃ jahijja akāmakāme | annāyaesī parivvae sa bhikkhū
text.1085: panne abhibhūya savvadaṃsī | je kamhi ci na mucchie sa bhikkhū
text.1086: akkosavahaṃ viittu dhīre | muṇī care lāḍhe niccam āyagutte /
text.1087: avvaggamaṇe asaṃpahiṭhe | je kasiṇaṃ ahiyāsae sa bhikkhū
text.1088: pantaṃ sayaṇāsaṇaṃ bhaittā | sīuṇhaṃ vivihaṃ ca daṃsamasagaṃ /
text.1089: avvaggamaṇe asaṃpahiṭhe | je kasiṇaṃ ahiyāsae sa bhikkhū
text.1090: no sakkaim icchaī na pūyaṃ | no vi ya vandaṇagaṃ kuo pasaṃsaṃ /
text.1091: se saṃjae suvvae tavassī | sahie āyagavesae sa bhikkhū
text.1092: jeṇa puṇa jahāi jīviyaṃ | mohaṃ vā kasiṇaṃ niyacchaī /
text.1093: naranāriṃ pajahe sayā tavassī | na ya koūhalaṃ uvei sa bhikkhū
text.1094: chinnaṃ saraṃ bhomam antalikkhaṃ | sumiṇaṃ lakkhaṇadaṇḍavatthuvijjaṃ /
text.1095: aṃgaviyāraṃ sarassa vijayaṃ | je vijjāhiṃ na jīvai sa bhikkhū
text.1097: āure saraṇaṃ tigicchiyaṃ ca | taṃ parinnāya parivvae sa bhikkhū
text.1098: khattiyagaṇa ugga rāyaputtā | māhaṇa bhoiya vivihā ya sippiṇo /
text.1099: no tesiṃ vayai silogapūyaṃ | taṃ parinnāya parivvae sa bhikkhū
text.1100: gihiṇo je pavvaieṇa diṭhā | appavaieṇa va saṃthuyā havijjā /
text.1101: tesiṃ ihaloiyaphalaṭhā | jo saṃthavaṃ na karei sa bhikkhū
text.1103: adae paḍisehie niyaṇṭhe | je tattha na paussaī sa bhikkhū
text.1104: jaṃ kiṃ ca āhārapāṇajāyaṃ | vivihaṃ khāimasāimaṃ paresiṃ laddhuṃ /
text.1105: jo taṃ tiviheṇa nāṇukampe | maṇavayakāyasusaṃvuḍe sa bhikkhū
text.1106: āyāmagaṃ ceva javodaṇaṃ ca | sīyaṃ sovīrajavodagaṃ ca /
text.1107: no hīlae piṇḍaṃ nīrasaṃ tu | pantakulāiṃ parivvae sa bhikkhū
text.1108: saddā vivihā bhavanti loe | divvā māṇussagā tiricchā /
text.1109: bhīmā bhayabheravā urālā | soccā na vihijjaī sa bhikkhū
text.1110: vādaṃ vivihaṃ samicca loe | sahie kheyāṇugae ya koviyappā /
text.1111: panne abhibhūya savvadaṃsī | uvasante aviheḍae sa bhikkhū
text.1112: asippajīvī agihe amitte | jiindie savvao vippamukke /

text.2110: aha teṇeva kāleṇaṃ | purīe tattha māhaṇe /
text.2111: vijayaghosi tti nāmeṇa | jannaṃ jayai veyavī
text.2115: na hu dāhāmi te bhikkhaṃ | bhikkhū jāyāhi annao
text.2116: je ya veyaviū vippā | jannaṭhā ya je diyā /
text.2117: joisaṃgaviū je ya | je ya dhammāṇa pāragā
text.2118: je samatthā samuddhattuṃ | param appāṇam eva ya /
text.2119: tesiṃ annamiṇaṃ deyaṃ | bho bhikkhū savvakāmiyaṃ
text.2120: so tattha eva paḍisiddho | jāyageṇa mahāmuṇī /
text.2121: na vi ruṭho na vi tuṭho | uttimaṭhagavesao
text.2122: nannaṭhaṃ pāṇaheuṃ vā | na vi nivvāhaṇāya vā /
text.2124: navi jāṇasi veyamuhaṃ | navi jannāṇa jaṃ muhaṃ /
text.2125: nakkhattāṇa muhaṃ jaṃ ca | jaṃ ca dhammāṇa vā muhaṃ
text.2126: je samatthā samuddhattuṃ | param appāṇam eva ya /
text.2127: na te tumaṃ viyāṇāsi | aha jāṇāsi to bhaṇa
text.2129: sapariso paṃjalī houṃ | pucchaī taṃ mahāmuṇiṃ
text.2130: veyāṇaṃ ca muhaṃ būhi | būhi jannāṇa jaṃ muhaṃ /
text.2131: nakkhattāṇa muhaṃ būhi | būhi dhammāṇa vā muhaṃ
text.2132: je samatthā samuddhattuṃ | param appāṇam eva ya /
text.2133: eyaṃ me saṃsayaṃ savvaṃ | sāhū kahasu pucchio
text.2135: nakkhattāṇa muhaṃ cando | dhammāṇa kāsavo muhaṃ
text.2140: jo loe bambhaṇo vutto | aggīva mahio jahā /
text.2141: sayā kusalasaṃdiṭhaṃ | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2142: jo na sajjai āgantuṃ | pavvayanto na soyaī /
text.2143: ramai ajjavayaṇaṃmi | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2147: suvvayaṃ pattanivvāṇaṃ | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2149: jo na hiṃsai tiviheṇa | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2150: kohā vā jai vā hāsā | lohā vā jai vā bhayā /
text.2151: musaṃ na vayaī jo u | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2152: cittamantam acittaṃ vā | appaṃ vā jai vā bahuṃ /
text.2153: na giṇhāi adattaṃ je | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2155: maṇasā kāyavakkeṇaṃ | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2156: jahā pomaṃ jale jāyaṃ | novalippai vāriṇā /
text.2157: evaṃ alittaṃ kāmehiṃ | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2159: asaṃsattaṃ gihatthesu | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2161: jo na sajjai bhogesuṃ | taṃ vayaṃ būma māhaṇaṃ
text.2162: pasubandhā savvaveyā ya | jaṭhaṃ ca pāvakammuṇā /
text.2163: na taṃ tāyanti dussīlaṃ | kammāṇi balavanti hi
text.2164: na vi muṇḍieṇa samaṇo | na oṃkāreṇa bambhaṇo /

text.2224: āsāḍhabahulapakkhe | bhaddavae kattie ya pose ya /

text.2229: tao uttaraguṇe kujjā | rāibhāesu causu vi
text.2230: paḍhamaṃ porisi sajjhāyaṃ | bīyaṃ jhāṇaṃ jhiyāyaī /

text.2246: ārabhaḍā sammaddā | vajjeyavvā ya mosalī taiyā /

text.2282: paḍhamaṃ porisi sajjhāyaṃ | bitiyaṃ jhāṇaṃ jhiyāyaī /

text.2285: sajjhāyaṃ tu tao kujjā | abohento asaṃjae

text.2301: jaṃ carittā bahū jīvā | tiṇṇā saṃsārasāgaraṃ  tti bemi ||

text.2333: kiṃ majjha duṭhasīsehiṃ | appā me avasīyaī

text.2342: nāṇaṃ ca daṃsaṇaṃ ceva | carittaṃ ca tavo tahā /

text.2344: nāṇaṃ ca daṃsaṇaṃ ceva | carittaṃ ca tavo tahā /
text.2347: ohināṇaṃ tu taiyaṃ | maṇanāṇaṃ ca kevalaṃ
text.2348: eyaṃ paṃcavihaṃ nāṇaṃ | davvāṇa ya guṇāṇa ya /

text.2351: lakkhaṇaṃ pajjavāṇaṃ tu | ubhao assiyā bhave
text.2353: esa logo tti pannatto | jiṇehiṃ varadaṃsihiṃ
text.2354: dhammo ahammo āgāsaṃ | davvaṃ ikkikkam āhiyaṃ /
text.2359: nāṇeṇaṃ daṃsaṇeṇaṃ ca | suheṇa ya duheṇa ya
text.2360: nāṇaṃ ca daṃsaṇaṃ ceva | carittaṃ ca tavo tahā /
text.2361: vīriyaṃ uvaogo ya | eyaṃ jīvassa lakkhaṇaṃ
text.2362: saddandhayāraṇujjoo | pahā chāyā tave i vā /
text.2364: egattaṃ ca puhattaṃ ca | saṃkhā saṃṭhāṇam eva ya /

text.2366: jīvājīvā ya bandho ya | puṇṇaṃ pāvāsavā tahā /
text.2367: saṃvaro nijjarā mokkho | santee tahiyā nava
text.2374: jo jiṇadiṭhe bhāve | cauvvihe saddahāi sayam eva /
text.2375: emeva nannaha ttiya | sa nisaggarui tti nāyavvo
text.2376: ee ceva u bhāve | uvaiṭhe jo pareṇa saddahaī /
text.2377: chaumattheṇa jiṇeṇa va | uvaesarui tti nāyavvo
text.2378: rāgo doso moho | annāṇaṃ jassa avagayaṃ hoi /
text.2379: āṇāe roeṃto | so khalu āṇāruī nāmaṃ
text.2380: jo suttam ahijjanto | sueṇa ogāhaī u sammattaṃ /
text.2381: aṃgeṇa bahireṇa va | so suttarui tti nāyavvo
text.2382: egeṇa aṇegāiṃ | payāiṃ jo pasaraī u sammattaṃ /
text.2383: udae vva tellabindū | so bīyarui tti nāyavvo
text.2384: so hoi abhigamaruī | suyanāṇaṃ jeṇa atthao diṭhaṃũ/
text.2389: jo kiriyābhāvaruī | so khalu kiriyāruī nāma
text.2392: jo atthikāyadhammaṃ | suyadhammaṃ khalu carittadhammaṃ ca /
text.2393: saddahai jiṇābhihiyaṃ | so dhammarui tti nāyavvo
text.2396: natthi carittaṃ sammatta | vihūṇaṃ daṃsaṇe u bhaiyavvaṃ /
text.2398: nādaṃsaṇissa nāṇaṃ | nāṇeṇa viṇā na hunti caraṇaguṇā /
text.2399: aguṇissa natthi mokkho | natthi amokkhassa nivvāṇaṃ

text.2831: accantakālassa samūlagassa | savvassa dukkhassa u jo pamokkho /
text.2832: taṃ bhāsao me paḍipuṇṇacittā | suṇeha egantahiyaṃ hiyatthaṃ
text.2834: rāgassa dosassa ya saṃkhaeṇaṃ | egantasokkhaṃ samuvei mokkhaṃ
text.2835: tassesa maggo guruviddhasevā | vivajjaṇā bālajaṇassa dūrā /
text.2837: āhāram icche miyam esaṇijjaṃ | sahāyam icche niuṇatthabuddhiṃ /

text.2839: na ya labhejjā niuṇaṃ sahāyaṃ | guṇāhiyaṃ vā guṇao samaṃ vā /

text.2841: jahā ya aṇḍappabhavā balāgā | aṇḍaṃ balāgappabhavaṃ jahā ya /

text.2843: rāgo ya doso vi ya kammabīyaṃ | kammaṃ ca mohappabhavaṃ vayanti /
text.2844: kammaṃ ca jāimaraṇassa mūlaṃ | dukkhaṃ ca jāīmaraṇaṃ vayanti
text.2845: dukkhaṃ hayaṃ jassa na hoi moho | moho hao jassa na hoi taṇhā /
text.2846: taṇhā hayā jassa na hoi loho | loho hao jassa na kiṃcaṇāiṃ
text.2847: rāgaṃ ca dosaṃ ca taheva mohaṃ | uddhattukāmeṇa samūlajālaṃ /
text.2848: je je uvāyā paḍivajjiyavvā | te kittaissāmi ahāṇupuvviṃ
text.2849: rasā pagāmaṃ na niseviyavvā | pāyaṃ rasā dittikarā narāṇaṃ /
text.2850: dittaṃ ca kāmā samabhiddavanti | dumaṃ jahā sāuphalaṃ va pakkhī
text.2851: jahā davaggī paurindhaṇe vaṇe | samāruo novasamaṃ uvei /
text.2852: evindiyaggī vi pagāmabhoiṇo | na bambhayārissa hiyāya kassaī
text.2854: na rāgasattū dharisei cittaṃ | parāio vāhirivosahehiṃ
text.2855: jahā birālāvasahassa mūle | na mūsagāṇaṃ vasahī pasatthā /
text.2856: emeva itthīnilayassa majjhe | na bambhayārissa khamo nivāso
text.2857: na rūvalāvaṇṇavilāsahāsaṃ | na jaṃpiyaṃ iṃgiyapehiyaṃ vā /
text.2858: itthīṇa cittaṃsi nivesaittā | daṭhuṃ vavasse samaṇe tavassī
text.2859: adaṃsaṇaṃ ceva apatthaṇaṃ ca | acintaṇaṃ ceva akittaṇaṃ ca /
text.2861: kāmaṃ tu devīhi vibhūsiyāhiṃ | na cāiyā khobhaiuṃ tiguttā /
text.2862: tahā vi egantahiyaṃ ti naccā | vivittavāso muṇiṇaṃ pasattho
text.2863: mokkhābhikaṃkhissa u māṇavassa | saṃsārabhīrussa ṭhiyassa dhamme /
text.2864: neyārisaṃ duttaram atthi loe | jahitthio bālamaṇoharāo
text.2865: ee ya saṃge samaikkamittā | suduttarā ceva bhavanti sesā /
text.2866: jahā mahāsāgaram uttarittā | naī bhave avi gaṃgāsamāṇā
text.2867: kāmāṇugiddhippabhavaṃ khu dukkhaṃ | savvassa logassa sadevagassa /
text.2868: jaṃ kāiyaṃ māṇasiyaṃ ca kiṃci | tassantagaṃ gacchai vīyarāgo
text.2869: jahā ya kiṃpāgaphalā maṇoramā | raseṇa vaṇṇeṇa ya bhujjamāṇā /
text.2870: te khuḍḍae jīviya paccamāṇā | eovamā kāmaguṇā vivāge
text.2871: je indiyāṇaṃ visayā maṇunnā | na tesu bhāvaṃ nisire kayāi /
text.2872: na yāmaṇunnesu maṇaṃ pi kujjā | samāhikāme samaṇe tavassī
text.2873: cakkhussa rūvaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | taṃ rāgaheuṃ tu maṇunnam āhu /
text.2874: taṃ dosaheuṃ amaṇunnam āhu | samo ya jo tesu sa vīyarāgo
text.2875: rūvassa cakkhuṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | cakkhussa rūvaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti /
text.2876: rāgassa heuṃ samaṇunnam āhu | dosassa heuṃ amaṇunnam āhu
text.2877: rūvesu jo gehim uvei tivvaṃ | akāliyaṃ pāvai se viṇāsaṃ /
text.2878: rāgāure se jaha vā payaṃge | āloyalole samuvei maccuṃ
text.2879: je yāvi dosaṃ samuvei tivvaṃ | taṃsi kkhaṇe se u uvei dukkhaṃ /
text.2880: duddantadoseṇa saeṇa jantū | na kiṃci rūvaṃ avarujjhaī se
text.2881: egantaratte ruiraṃsi rūve | atālise se kuṇaī paosaṃ /
text.2882: dukkhassa saṃpīlam uvei bāle | na lippaī teṇa muṇī virāgā
text.2884: cittehi te paritāvei bāle | pīlei attaṭhagurū kiliṭhe
text.2886: vae vioge ya kahaṃ suhaṃ se | saṃbhogakāle ya atittalābhe
text.2887: rūve atitte ya pariggahaṃmi | sattovasatto na uvei tuṭhiṃ /
text.2888: atuṭhidoseṇa duhī parassa | lobhāvile āyayaī adattaṃ
text.2889: taṇhābhibhūyassa adattahāriṇo | rūve atittassa pariggahe ya /
text.2890: māyāmusaṃ vaḍḍhai lobhadosā | tatthāvi dukkhā na vimuccaī se
text.2891: mosassa pacchā ya puratthao ya | paogakāle ya duhī durante /
text.2892: evaṃ adattāṇi samāyayanto | rūve atitto duhio aṇisso
text.2893: rūvāṇurattassa narassa evaṃ | katto suhaṃ hojja kayāi kiṃci /
text.2894: tatthovabhoge vi kilesadukkhaṃ | nivvattaī jassa kaeṇa dukkhaṃ
text.2895: emeva rūvammi gao paosaṃ | uvei dukkhohaparaṃparāo /
text.2896: paduṭhacitto ya ciṇāi kammaṃ | jaṃ se puṇo hoi duhaṃ vivāge
text.2897: rūve viratto maṇuo visogo | eeṇa dukkhohaparaṃpareṇa /
text.2898: na lippae bhavamajjhe vi santo | jaleṇa vā pokkhariṇīpalāsaṃ
text.2899: soyassa saddaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | taṃ rāgaheuṃ tu maṇunnam āhu /
text.2900: taṃ dosaheuṃ amaṇunnam āhu | samo ya jo tesu sa vīyarāgo
text.2901: saddassa soyaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | soyassa saddaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti /
text.2902: rāgassa heuṃ samaṇunnam āhu | dosassa heuṃ amaṇunnam āhu
text.2903: saddesu jo gehim uvei tivvaṃ | akāliyaṃ pāvai se viṇāsaṃ /
text.2904: rāgāure hariṇamige va muddhe | sadde atitte samuvei maccuṃ
text.2905: je yāvi dosaṃ samuvei tivvaṃ | taṃsi kkhaṇe se u uvei dukkhaṃ /

text.2925: ghāṇassa gandhaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | taṃ rāgaheuṃ tu maṇunnam āhu /

text.2927: gandhassa ghāṇaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti | ghāṇassa gandhaṃ gahaṇaṃ vayanti /

text.3029: evindiyatthā ya maṇassa atthā | dukkhassa heuṃ maṇuyassa rāgiṇo /
text.3030: te ceva thovaṃ pi kayāi dukkhaṃ | na vīyarāgassa karenti kiṃci
text.3031: na kāmabhogā samayaṃ uventi | na yāvi bhogā vigaiṃ uventi /
text.3032: je tappaosī ya pariggahī ya | so tesu mohā vigaiṃ uvei
text.3033: kohaṃ ca māṇaṃ ca taheva māyaṃ | lohaṃ dugucchaṃ araiṃ raiṃ ca /
text.3034: hāsaṃ bhayaṃ sogapumitthiveyaṃ | napuṃsaveyaṃ vivihe ya bhāve
text.3035: āvajjaī evam aṇegarūve | evaṃvihe kāmaguṇesu satto /
text.3036: anne ya eyappabhave visese | kāruṇṇadīṇe hirime baisse
text.3037: kappaṃ na icchijja sahāyalicchū | pacchāṇutāve na tavappabhāvaṃ /
text.3039: tao se jāyanti paoyaṇāiṃ | nimajjiuṃ mohamahaṇṇavammi /
text.3040: suhesiṇo dukkhaviṇoyaṇaṭhā | tappaccayaṃ ujjamae ya rāgī
text.3042: na tassa savve vi maṇunnayaṃ vā | nivvattayantī amaṇunnayaṃ vā
text.3044: atthe asaṃkappayao tao se | pahīyae kāmaguṇesu taṇhā
text.3045: sa vīyarāgo kayasavvakicco | khavei nāṇāvaraṇaṃ khaṇeṇaṃ /
text.3046: taheva jaṃ daṃsaṇam āvarei | jaṃ cantarāyaṃ pakarei kammaṃ
text.3047: savvaṃ tao jāṇai pāsae ya | amohaṇe hoi nirantarāe /
text.3048: aṇāsave jhāṇasamāhijutte | āukkhae mokkham uvei suddhe
text.3049: so tassa savvassa duhassa mukko | jaṃ bāhaī sayayaṃ jantum eyaṃ /
text.3050: dīhāmayaṃ vippamukko pasattho | to hoi accantasuhī kayattho
text.3052: viyāhio jaṃ samuvicca sattā | kameṇa accantasuhī bhavanti
text.3056: jehiṃ baddho ayaṃ jīvo | saṃsāre parivaaī
text.3058: veyaṇijjaṃ tahā mohaṃ | āukammaṃ taheva ya
text.3059: nāmakammaṃ ca goyaṃ ca | antarāyaṃ taheva ya /
text.3060: evam eyāi kammāiṃ | aṭheva u samāsao
text.3062: ohināṇaṃ ca taiyaṃ | maṇanāṇaṃ ca kevalaṃ
text.3063: niddā taheva payalā | niddāniddā payalapayalā ya /
text.3064: tatto ya thīṇagiddhī u | paṃcamā hoi nāyavvā
text.3067: veyaṇīyaṃ pi ya duvihaṃ | sāyam asāyaṃ ca āhiyaṃ /
text.3068: sāyassa u bahū bheyā | emeva asāyassa vi
text.3069: mohaṇijjaṃ pi duvihaṃ | daṃsaṇe caraṇe tahā /
text.3070: daṃsaṇe tivihaṃ vuttaṃ | caraṇe duvihaṃ bhave
text.3071: sammattaṃ ceva micchattaṃ | sammāmicchattam eva ya /
text.3076: sattavihaṃ navavihaṃ vā | kammaṃ ca nokasāyajaṃ
text.3078: devāuyaṃ cautthaṃ tu | āuṃ kammaṃ cauvvihaṃ
text.3079: nāmaṃ kammaṃ tu duvihaṃ | suhamasuhaṃ ca āhiyaṃ /
text.3080: subhassa u bahū bheyā | emeva asuhassa vi
text.3081: goyaṃ kammaṃ duvihaṃ | uccaṃ nīyaṃ ca āhiyaṃ /
text.3082: uccaṃ aṭhavihaṃ hoi | evaṃ nīyaṃ pi āhiyaṃ
text.3083: dāṇe lābhe ya bhoge ya | uvabhoge vīrie tahā /
text.3086: paesaggaṃ khettakāle ya | bhāvaṃ ca uttaraṃ suṇa
text.3090: savvesu vi paesesu | savvaṃ savveṇa baddhagaṃ
text.3093: āvaraṇijjāṇa duṇhaṃ pi | veyaṇijje taheva ya /
text.3094: antarāe ya kammammi | ṭhiī esā viyāhiyā
text.3104: eesi saṃvare ceva | khavaṇe ya jae buho  tti bemi ||
text.3108: chaṇhaṃ pi kammalesāṇaṃ | aṇubhāve suṇeha me
text.3110: ṭhāṇaṃ ṭhiiṃ gaiṃ cāuṃ | lesāṇaṃ tu suṇeha me
text.3111: kiṇhā nīlā ya kāū ya | teū pamhā taheva ya /
text.3112: sukkalesā ya chaṭhā ya | nāmāiṃ tu jahakkamaṃ
text.3126: etto vi aṇantaguṇo | raso ya kiṇhāe nāyavvo
text.3127: jaha tigaḍuyassa ya raso | tikkho jaha hatthipippalīe vā /
text.3128: etto vi aṇantaguṇo | raso u nīlāe nāyavvo
text.3130: etto vi aṇantaguṇo | raso u kāūe nāyavvo
text.3132: etto vi aṇantaguṇo | raso u teūe nāyavvo
text.3133: varavāruṇīe va raso | vivihāṇa va āsavāṇa jārisao /

text.3173: muhuttaddhaṃ tu jahannā | tettīsā sāgarā muhuttahiyā /

text.3185: esā khalu lesāṇaṃ | oheṇa ṭhiī vaṇṇiyā hoi /
text.3186: causu vi gaīsu etto | lesāṇa ṭhiiṃ tu vocchāmi
text.3187: dasa vāsasahassāiṃ | kāūe ṭhiī jahanniyā hoi /
text.3193: esā neraiyāṇaṃ | lesāṇa ṭhiī u vaṇṇiyā hoi /
text.3195: antomuhuttam addhaṃ | lesāṇa jahiṃ jahiṃ jāu /
text.3196: tiriyāṇa narāṇaṃ vā | vajjittā kevalaṃ lesaṃ
text.3197: muhuttaddhaṃ tu jahannā | ukkosā hoi puvvakoḍīo /
text.3199: esā tiriyanarāṇaṃ | lesāṇa ṭhiī u vaṇṇiyā hoi /
text.3200: teṇa paraṃ vocchāmi | lesāṇa ṭhiīu devāṇaṃ
text.3201: dasa vāsasahassāiṃ | kiṇhāe ṭhiī jahanniyā hoi /
text.3202: paliyam asaṃkhijja imo | ukkoso hoi kiṇhāe
text.3203: jā kiṇhāe ṭhiī khalu | ukkosā sā u samayam abbhahiyā /
text.3204: jahanneṇaṃ nīlāe | paliyam asaṃkhaṃ ca ukkosā
text.3205: jā nīlāe ṭhiī khalu | ukkosā sā u samayam abbhahiyā /
text.3206: jahanneṇaṃ kāūe | paliyam asaṃkhaṃ ca ukkosā
text.3207: teṇa paraṃ vocchāmi | teūlesā jahā suragāṇaṃ /

text.3398: joyaṇassa u jo tattha | koso uvarimo bhave /

text.3414: duvihā puḍhavījīvā ya | suhumā bāyarā tahā /

text.3678: devā cauvvihā vuttā | te me kittayao suṇa /
text.3684: pisāyabhūyā jakkhā ya | rakkhasā kinnarā ya kiṃpurisā /
text.3686: candā sūrā ya nakkhattā | gahā tārāgaṇā tahā /
text.3688: vemāṇiyā u je devā | duvihā te viyāhiyā /
text.3689: kappovagā ya bodhavvā | kappāīyā taheva ya
text.3693: āraṇā accuyā ceva | ii kappovagā surā
text.3694: kappāīyā u je devā | duvihā te viyāhiyā /
text.3696: heṭhimā heṭhimā ceva | heṭhimā majjhimā tahā /
text.3697: heṭhimā uvarimā ceva | majjhimā heṭhimā tahā
text.3698: majjhimā majjhimā ceva | majjhimā uvarimā tahā /
text.3699: uvarimā heṭhimā ceva | uvarimā majjhimā tahā
text.3700: uvarimā uvarimā ceva | iya gevijjagā surā /
text.3704: logassa egadesammi | te savve vi viyāhiyā /
text.3705: itto kālavibhāgaṃ tu | vucchaṃ tesiṃ cauvvihaṃ
text.3707: ṭhiiṃ paḍucca sāīyā | sapajjavasiyā vi ya
text.3708: sāhīyaṃ sāgaraṃ ekkaṃ | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3710: paliovamam egaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3718: sāgarāṇi ya satteva | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3720: sāhiyā sāgarā satta | ukkoseṇaṃ ṭhiī bhave /
text.3722: dasa ceva sāgarāiṃ | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3730: sāgarā auṇavīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3732: vīsaṃ tu sāgarāiṃ | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3734: sāgarā ikkavīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3746: sāgarā sattavīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3748: sāgarā aṭhavīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3750: sāgarā auṇatīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3752: tīsaṃ tu sāgarāiṃ | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3754: sāgarā ikkatīsaṃ tu | ukkoseṇa ṭhiī bhave /
text.3760: jā ceva u āuṭhiī | devāṇaṃ tu viyāhiyā /
text.3761: sā tesiṃ kāyaṭhiī | jahannam ukkosiyā bhave
text.3763: vijaḍhaṃmi sae kāe | devāṇaṃ hujja antaraṃ
text.3766: saṃsāratthā ya siddhā ya | iya jīvā viyāhiyā /
text.3767: rūviṇo cevarūvī ya | ajīvā duvihā vi ya
text.3768: iya jīvamajīve ya | soccā saddahiūṇa ya /
text.3775: biīe vāsacaukkammi | vicittaṃ tu tavaṃ care
text.3777: tao saṃvaccharaddhaṃ tu | nāivigiṭhaṃ tavaṃ care
text.3778: tao saṃvaccharaddhaṃ tu | vigiṭhaṃ tu tavaṃ care /
text.3779: parimiyaṃ ceva āyāmaṃ | taṃmi saṃvacchare kare
text.3782: kandappam ābhiogaṃ ca | kivvisiyaṃ moham āsuruttaṃ ca /
text.3785: iya je maranti jīvā | tesiṃ puṇa dullahā bohī
text.3787: iya je maranti jīvā | tesiṃ sulahā bhave bohī
text.3789: iya je maranti jīvā | tesiṃ puṇa dullahā bohī
text.3792: bālamaraṇāṇi bahuso | akāmamaraṇāṇi ceva ya bahūṇi /
text.3793: marihinti te varāyā | jiṇavayaṇaṃ je na jāṇanti
text.3797: vimhāvento vi paraṃ | kandappaṃ bhāvaṇaṃ kuṇai
text.3798: mantājogaṃ kāuṃ | bhūīkammaṃ ca je pauṃjanti /
text.3802: aṇubaddharosapasaro | taha ya nimittaṃmi hoi paḍisevī /
text.3804: satthagahaṇaṃ visabhakkhaṇaṃ ca | jalaṇaṃ ca jalapaveso ya /
